title: Andrew Garfield | Pence's "Chilling" Words on Jan. 6; Greene's Texts About "Marshall Law": A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Kevin McCarthy and Marjorie Taylor Greene lying about their roles in the January 6 insurrection and a member of the committee investigating the insurrection revealing what he called the most chilling moment from that day.

Then, Andrew Garfield talks about the story behind Under the Banner of Heaven, being a "slut for true crime” and Tom Holland's comments on Spider-Man's butt.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
